::Four Nightmares::

    They were hit hard and almost went out. But they c=
ontinued to fire. Two of them firing 20 shots at Hell Beast's head once aga=
in, and the other to shooting for centre mass on Gremlin.
  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Fr=
iday, December 15, 2000 11:35 PM
  Subject: Re: Cross Fire


         Hell =
Beast turns to see the Nightmare foursome along with the two 
  other join =
the battle, now it was 9 agianst 7. A bit difficult but it could 
  all be =
handled with stratigy. Turning, he saw Gremlin already firing at some 
  of=
 the Nightmare group, and Hell Beast joined too. 

          Aerostreak fro=
wned at Quasar, obviously she seemed to be knowing 
  what she was doing. "=
Alright, sorry. Just lets shows these rebles who there 
  dealing with!"
